reviews.text: The location is simply excellent , both Vienna historic center and Schönbrunn are about 20mn away with the metro.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very close to Westbahnhof, where you can find direct buses to and from the airport.
reviews.title: Great quality

reviews.text: The rooms are quite big for Ibis , Wifi is free , and breakfast is absolutely great ! it is a buffet with hot and cold dishes, my favourite hotel breakfast so far !
reviews.title: ibis mariahilfer

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms on the Gürtel can be noisy.
reviews.title: My stay at this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a nice 'classic' Ibis hotel. Excellent location (railway/city center/Schonbrunn). Good breakfast, which is not always the case at Ibis. Easy reaching underground and train (Westbanhof), within the 5-min walking distance. Nice shopping street nearby at the same distance. I recommend it.
reviews.title: Good one - recommended

reviews.text: This hotel is in one fantastic location and I was put on the 10th floor, giving me a breaktaking view of Vienna! The rooms are clean and the staff was very welcoming. Being vegetarians we had trouble finding food in other cities we travelled, but the food courts around this hotel gave us enough options to not go hungry.
reviews.title: Loved it!

reviews.text: We were first-time tourists in Vienna and settled on this place because it was air-conditioned
reviews.title: hmmm..

reviews.text: This is my second stay in the hotel. I like it because it is close to the metro network and the center. It has rooms for 3 people (comfortably bigger than the standard for 2). Rates, cleanliness and service are up to the standard for Ibis hotels.
reviews.title: Hotel Ibis Wien Mariahilf

reviews.text: Note: If you don't have an reservation the rates are 10-15 euros better if you have a Le Club Accorhotels card.
reviews.title: Very good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed a total of 4 nights in this Ibis Mariahilf situated couple of miles outside the cenre of Vienna. The hotel is supposedly located on the edge of a slightly seedier district of Vienna but compared to London and other places didn't feel threatening at all.
reviews.title: Served our needs but with a few snags

reviews.text: The hotel was your typical Ibis affair: Hundreds of rooms stacked into a tall tower with your typical functional, clean and adequate rooms.
reviews.title: ibis vienna

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was a breeze wth our request for a quiet rooms fulfilled with them allocating us a top floor room that offered some fantastic views of the city. Only downside to this was the time it took for the lift to arrive to the top floor, one day it took nearly 10 minutes!
reviews.title: Typical ibis hotel, typical ibis room, excellent location!
